channel.title: math.QA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.QA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Classification of connected \'etale algebras in multiplicity-free modular fusion categories up to rank nine
item.description: arXiv:2404.16125v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We classify connected \'etale algebras $A$'s in multiplicity-free modular fusion categories $\mathcal B$'s with $\text{rank}(\mathcal B)\le9$. We also identify categories $\mathcal B_A$'s of right $A$-modules. The results have physical applications in constraining renormalization group flows. As demonstration, we study massive renormalization group flows from non-unitary minimal models to predict ground state degeneracies and prove spontaneous $\mathcal B$-symmetry breaking.
item.dc:creator: Ken Kikuchi
